text: I can't agree more with you about the music. Especially the songs by Moon appear on my playlist now and then, the other tracks feel more "situational" and only work in the context of the game for me. I do think that it doesn't need an expansion though. I feel that it would suffer if you'd introduce additional gameplay-mechanics or even "water it down". I'd be glad about mission-packs. Or hell, even an editor.

author: SupraDarky

text: I really enjoyed this game, it left me wanting more. I feel like this could be a great prototype for an even better and expanded game in the same kind of universe. It's a perfect example of music complementing a game and vice versa. One wouldn't be as good without the other. The OST pumps you up while playing the game. It has a couple themes like this one that are also very enjoyable outside the game.
author: SupraDarky
